Class Application

java.lang.Object
models.Application
public class Application extends Object
Represents an application made by an applicant for a project.

This class handles the details of an application, including:

  • Managing application status and history
  • Handling approval, rejection, booking, and withdrawal of applications
  • Tracking application status changes with timestamps

  • Constructor Details

    • Application

      public Application(String applicantNRIC, String projectId, FlatType selectedFlatType)

      Creates a new application with the given details.

      Parameters:
      applicantNRIC - NRIC of the applicant.
      projectId - ID of the project.
      selectedFlatType - The flat type selected by the applicant.

    • Application

      public Application(String applicationID, String applicantNRIC, String projectId, FlatType selectedFlatType, ApplicationStatus applicationStatus, boolean isWithdrawalRequested, LocalDateTime applicationDate, String approvedBy, Map<ApplicationStatus,LocalDateTime> statusHistory)

      Creates a new application with all details provided (including status history).

      Parameters:
      applicationID - Unique application ID.
      applicantNRIC - NRIC of the applicant.
      projectId - ID of the project.
      selectedFlatType - The flat type selected by the applicant.
      applicationStatus - Current status of the application.
      isWithdrawalRequested - Whether withdrawal has been requested.
      applicationDate - Date when the application was submitted.
      approvedBy - The person who approved or rejected the application.
      statusHistory - A map of status history with timestamps.

    • approve

      public void approve(String manager)

      Approves the application.

      Parameters:
      manager - The name of the manager approving the application.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the application is not pending.

    • reject

      public void reject(String manager)

      Rejects the application.

      Parameters:
      manager - The name of the manager rejecting the application.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the application is not pending.

    • book

      public void book()

      Books the application.

      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the application is not successful.

    • requestWithdrawal

      public void requestWithdrawal()

      Requests withdrawal of the application.

      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if withdrawal has already been requested or if the application cannot be withdrawn.
